titles.title: Northern Nevada Land Conservation and Economic Development Act
Elko Motocross and Tribal Conveyance Act
Lyon County Economic Development and Conservation Act
Naval Air Station Fallon Housing and Safety Development Act
Pine Forest Range Recreation Enhancement Act
Restoring Storey County Act
To authorize certain land conveyances involving public lands in northern Nevada to promote economic development and conservation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.
